Definition at line 35 of file CCamera.cpp.

bool CCamera::detach (  ) 

This function will dettach the camera from a object. If this happens, the camera can be scrolled manually.

void CCamera::process (  )  [virtual]

This is main cycle which will be called every Logic loop Here it moves automatically, performs the smooth scrolling and gets the controls to move when it's not attached to an object
